article_title: Reducing cost through high-value referral networks
article_text: "There can be a snowball effect, where you have more and more costs that often could have been prevented by just doing better primary care." says James A. Colbert, MD, Instructor in Medicine at Harvard Medical School, as he discusses how data analytics can help healthcare organizations develop high-value referral networks for specialty care and subsequently reduce costs.
